quote: The need for change bulldozed a road down the center of my mind.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I have made mistakes, but I will not let them define me.
author: Unknown

quote: I am making peace with the fact that my to-do list will never be done.
author: Nedra Glover Tawwab

quote: You are the sky — everything else is just the weather.
author: Pema Chödrön

quote: Each day is the field of brightness where the invitation of our life unfolds.
author: John O’Donohue

quote: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you’ll start having positive results.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: What I have done today was the best I was able to do today. And for that, I am thankful.
author: Unknown

quote: If you don’t decide what your priorities are in life, everyone else will decide for you.
author: Christy Wright

quote: You are always on your way to a miracle.
author: Susan Ariel Rainbow Kennedy

quote: I can do anything but not everything.
author: Greg McKeown

quote: Happiness is a choice, and today I choose to be happy.
author: Unknown

quote: Remember that what’s happened to you does not define who you are.
author: Noa Shaw

quote: Turn your face toward the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
author: Maori proverb

quote: I finish what matters and let go of what does not.
author: Unknown

quote: No matter what gets done and how much is left undone, I am enough.
author: Brené Brown
